basic.description: An examination of the internal accounting model and related information systems designed to keep the manager informed for the purposes of planning and controlling the organization's operations.
basic.subject: COMM
basic.title: Intro To Management Accounting

extra.enrollment_requirement:
(Prerequisite of COMM111 and registration in a BCOM Academic Program) or a COMM-X Academic Plan.
exclusion   no more than 1 fr COMM112 and 212
